name: HEDRON (kushion, nikllamadev)
description:
A dicey game about learning to balance luck and skill. You will play as a dice connoisseur who has several unique dice at their fingertips. Some dice have more faces than others, other dice have unique abilities. Using these dice, you must satisfy simple mathematical equations.

Note: This game is unfinished due to scope creep, that one demon all game developers face. While there is no story or end goal, all game mechanics, art, and sound design that were meant to be in the final product are included in this unfinished game.

Side Note: It is recommended that you either play in Fullscreen or in the Downloadable build.

Programming - nikllamadev

Art - kushion

This game was made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam.
